front.title: IS-IS Extensions to Support Segment Routing over IPv6 Dataplane

abstract.t: The Segment Routing (SR) architecture allows flexible definition of the end-to-end path by encoding it as a sequence of topological elements called "segments". It can be implemented over the MPLS or the IPv6 data plane. This document describes the IS-IS extensions required to support Segment Routing over the IPv6 data plane. This document updates RFC 7370 by modifying an existing registry.
